sentence.Network_en: I've come to pick your brains . You're metallurgist, and I've been asked this question about steel.

sentence.Network_cn: 冶金学家是决定哪种金属最合适于某种用途的科学家.

entry.def: A metallurgist is an expert in metallurgy.

means.word_mean: 1. an engineer trained in the extraction and refining and alloying and fabrication of metals
